subject: Psychology
title: Implementation Intentions
description: A quick win: understand Implementation Intentions.

hook.text: 'I'll exercise more' fails. 'I'll run at 7am on Monday at the park' succeeds. Specificity changes everything.

buildup.text: Implementation intentions are if-then plans: 'If situation X arises, I will perform behavior Y.'

discovery.text: Gollwitzer's research showed that implementation intentions doubled or tripled follow-through rates on goals.

twist.text: They work by pre-loading the decision. When the moment arrives, you don't deliberate â€” you just act on the plan.

climax.text: Vague goals leave room for excuses. Specific if-then plans close the gap between intending and doing.

punchline.text: Don't decide what to do. Decide when and where to do it.

quiz.question: What did Gollwitzer's research show about implementation intentions?
options: They doubled or tripled follow-through rates on goals
They had no effect on behavior
They only work for physical exercise
